name: Golem Heart
description:
By an unknown power you have been given life. Your stony form awakens in the depths of hell. Confused, lost and alone, can you escape and be free of this nightmare

Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

* NB made for Ludum dare Music mini jam.

Combat is planned, and more levels will be made should enough interest be provided.
